items.sentence: We're not allowed to tell Tom what's happening.
Tom has had many chances to do the right thing.
Tom has finally found out who Mary's father is.
Tom quickly undressed and got under the covers.
Tom plans to meet Mary on October 20th at 2:30.
Tom needs to be back in Boston by October 20th.
Tom might not be living on Park Street anymore.
Tom isn't the kind of person I'd hang out with.
Tom isn't likely to be able to do that for you.
Tom is just a beginner, but he's learning fast.
